text_block_list.text:
――There was something that I had been thinking about for a while 
now. As Verxina's trainer, could I really stay the way I was――

As a role model to her younger sisters, she continued to strive for 
the 『Peak』……Am I currently someone that Verxina can rely on?

No. I had to try to become someone 
she could truly rely on. To do that――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Did I arrive too early?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
And instead of on campus, 
why am I waiting by the main road――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……Oh?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san……what's with this car? 
And why are you wearing those sunglasses?――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……heh?
choice_data_list: It's fine――I just got here too
It's fine――I just got here too

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……I guess you did?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay. Please excuse me.

Alright――everything's going well so far. Just like that 
e-book, 『100 Ways to Become a Reliable Person』 said.
……the car's a rental though.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Wow……you can see the whole city. It's beautiful……!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
When you're surrounded by trees, it's a completely different scent 
compared to in the city, isn't it? The breeze feels nice too――

I knew about this nice spot that was perfect for relaxation. 
This was just one part of being a reliable adu――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……Let's stay calm.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
If we stay calm, it won't sting us. 
Let's just wait until it moves away.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Don't worry. I'll be fine.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
In the off chance it does try to sting me…… 
At that moment, I'll crush it.

And so――the bee landed on Verxina. 
She remained calm and eventually the bee flew away.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I'm glad. ……everything ended without something unfortunate happening.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. It's because I'm the expert bug 
exterminator in our home. Just leave it to me.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh. 
So at this lake you can feed the ducks, huh?

text_block_list.name: Ducks
text_block_list.text: Quack-Quack♪

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Waah. Fufu, seeing them digging in with 
such gusto is really cute, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Ducks
text_block_list.text:
『Quack-Quack-!』『Quack?』『Quack quack quack!?』 
『Quack!!!!』『Quaaaaack!! Quaaaaack!!』

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Spread the food on the ground!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: See? The tasty food is over there!

text_block_list.name: Ducks
text_block_list.text: Quack, quack～……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, no, no. ……Maybe I should try feeding them too. 
Would you mind sharing a bit of that food with me?

……this wasn't going so well. Rather than showing how reliable 
I was, it was more like I was showing how reliable Verxina was――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……The smell of the salt breeze is comforting isn't it? 
It brings back memories of playing on the beach as a kid.

……Even her casual words felt like consideration towards me. 
I could feel things getting more awkward when――

In addition to the wind blowing earlier, 
it started to lightly rain.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh…… What should we do? 
Is there somewhere around here we can take shelter――
I'm glad I brought a collapsible umbrella with me just in case――

………… 
But as soon as a strong breeze blew, the umbrella broke.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……Oh dear……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
!? What's wrong, Trainer-san? 
Why are you taking off your jacket――
choice_data_list: We'll use this as an umbrella……!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
But, then Trainer-san will…… 
For me, this isn't a big deal――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
(……why is it? I feel a little nostalgic. 
……That's right. If I remember, before……――)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
(When we were younger, playing in the park with my younger sisters. 
And suddenly――it started raining heavily……)

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh no! C'mon! Over here! 
Vivlos, Cheval, come get under Onee-chan's jacket!

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……I'll get completely soaked? 
It's fine! Onee-chan is strong!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
(……It feels like, the me from back then―― 
Is just like Trainer-san now――)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……I understand. Then I'll take you up on that offer.

……Thankfully, there was a mall a few minutes walk away. 
But still, I was completely soaked……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
choice_data_list: Are you okay? You didn't get too wet?
Are you okay? You didn't get too wet?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah! Thanks to you, I'm alright. 
Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Fufu. No, there's no problem.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: It felt――a little nostalgic though.
